Reviews.Title: flawed software hold this back
Reviews.Author: A. White
Reviews.Content: First off I have owned a lot of phones from iPhone's to windows 8 and high end Android phone so know what good looks like,  this is relatively chunky,  and large in the hand. The screen is ok, not great and you can see the wires in the digitizer.The screen itself has very good viewing angles and the colors are not bad, it does have a fairly low resolution,  falling between the original iPhone and retina,  best described as adequate rather than sharp.The camera is fairly rubbish,  with pretty bad compression and poor detail.Sound is good and speaker clarity is as good as any other standard mobile.Battery life is great on account of the energy efficient CPU and crazy size battery.Performance is astonishing,  I had a tegra 3 LG p880 before this and this feels much much much slicker I really cannot emphasise that point enough this feels a very fast phone.  I have played 3d games such as judge dredd and this runs it smooth as butter.I haven't used the dual sim facility but will say 3g performance is poor expect 2mbps Max out of this no matter where you are,  my LG gave 6 and my Samsung ativ gave 11!!This phone problem is software. There are some very slick Samsung s4 roms out there that are great but the problem with them is they crash all the time with Bluetooth and calls. I have tried several and I am forever being"reset" with prompts for sim pin.  But for this we would definitely be looking at4 stars.  Will update if get a decent rom.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Minerva Rodriguez de Tizon
Reviews.Content: I like the big screen the best. The Price is just what I have and I am very happy for what I got.I use it with wi-fi at home walking around and also while taking the bus going to school.It is great with whatsup and vine Works superb.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT
Reviews.Author: Edgar Nello
Reviews.Content: I WILL BUY SEVERAL PHONES THIS MODEL. THIS PHONE IS FAAAAAASSSSTTTTT ..the product fulfilled expectations. good quality, nice and good price. was worth doing this business, I recommend this product. thanks

Reviews.Title: zte v967s
Reviews.Author: Pedro Perez De Moya
Reviews.Content: Great device.! Just buy a second one, same model. Would recommend this cell phone.Shippment was fast too.Buen equipo, acabo de comprar otro del mismo modelo.Lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: Can not turn on the 3G.
Reviews.Author: Linda J.
Reviews.Content: Can not send or receive picture messages. Is not a 3G phone? Would like any suggestions anyone might have that would enable the 3G.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE/ GREAT SUPPORT!
Reviews.Author: WILLIAM JOHN RIGNEY Jr. "MIDWAY41"
Reviews.Content: you have to be smarter than a box of rocks to find and get all the APN settings changed properly. but once you do that it's a great phone. works like a champ here in my tiny little texas town. we have two of them up and running here. seller support was superb! even all the way from china! BILL RIGNEY SENDS.  BT

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: LUIS ROBERTO
Reviews.Content: were very good my products, this again could buy more, provided the committee recommends .. the quality is awesome .. thank you very much
